Package game.runes

Class RuneManager

java.lang.Object
game.runes.RuneManager
public class RuneManager
extends java.lang.Object
A rune manager class that keeps track of all rune droppers and players. Created by:
Author:
Brendan Nguyen, Neev Bhandari
